Title: Enacts the "private well testing act"
Summary: Enacts the "private well testing act"; authorizes the department of health to promulgate rules and regulations to establish standards for the testing of drinking water from privately owned wells.
LawCode: Amd §3-0315, En Con L; amd §§206 & 1100, add §1111, Pub Health L; add §468, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the public health law and the real property law, in relation to enacting the "private well testing act"
